languages.text: "И кое-что пообещать. Церковь присмотрит за вашими подданными — все таки {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}немало добра от вас видели{/d}, грех не отплатить. Паства уже грузит на ваш корабль припасы, а вы примите от церкви святого Друза дар признательности. С такими людьми, как вы, у этого Богом-Императором забытого угла космоса есть еще шанс стать славным местом".

"To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."
languages.original_text: "И кое-что пообещать. Церковь присмотрит за вашими подданными — все таки {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}немало добра от вас видели{/d}, грех не отплатить. Паства уже грузит на ваш корабль припасы, а вы примите от церкви святого Друза дар признательности. С такими людьми, как вы, у этого Богом-Императором забытого угла космоса есть еще шанс стать славным местом".

traits.locale_text: "To promise something, too. My church will look after your subjects. You've done us a lot of good and it would be a sin not to repay in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Church of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “我还要承诺你一些事情。我的教会会好好照顾你的臣民，{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}你为我们做了这么多善事{/d}，如果不报答你那就太不像话了。我的教徒已经在往你的船上搬运补给品了。此外，我还有一件个人礼物，代表圣德鲁苏斯教会送给你，聊表谢意。虽然落脚港已经被神皇遗弃了，但只要有你这样的人，这个被遗弃的垃圾堆依然有希望变成个好地方。”
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: “我还要承诺你一些事情。我的教会会好好照顾你的臣民，你为我们做了这么多好事，如果不报答你那就太不像话了。我的教徒已经在为你的船搬运补给品了。此外，我还有一件个人礼物，代表圣德鲁苏斯教会送给你，聊表谢意。虽然落脚港已经被神皇遗弃了，但如果有你这样的人的话，这个被遗弃的垃圾堆依然有希望变成个好地方。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「約束します。私の教会が、あなた方の臣民の面倒を見ます。{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}あなたは私達に沢山の事をしてくださった{/d}。その恩を返さないのは、正義ではありません。私の信徒たちが、すでにあなたの船に物資を積んでいます。さらに、聖ドルスス教団から個人的に、あなたに贈りたい物があります。あなたのような方がいれば、神帝陛下に忘れられたこの世の片隅にも、清らかな場所になるチャンスがあるのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: 「約束します。私の教会が、あなた方の臣民の面倒を見ます。{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}あなたは私達に沢山の事をしてくださった{/d}。その恩を返さないのは、正義ではありません。私の信徒たちが、すでにあなたの船に物資を積んでいます。さらに、聖ドルスス教団から個人的に、あなたに贈りたい物があります。あなたのような方がいれば、神帝陛下に忘れられたこの世の片隅にも、清らかな場所になるチャンスがあるのかもしれません」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Y para prometerle algo. Mi misión cuidará de sus súbditos. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}Nos ha hecho mucho bien{/d} y sería injusto no pagarle con la misma moneda. Miembros de mi congregación ya están cargando su nave con suministros. Además, tengo un regalo de agradecimiento para usted de parte del Culto de San Drusus. Con gente como usted, este rincón del universo dejado de la mano de Dios Emperador aún tiene una oportunidad de convertirse en un lugar mejor».
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: «Y para prometerle algo. Mi iglesia cuidará de sus súbditos. Nos ha hecho mucho bien y sería injusto no pagarle con la misma moneda. Miembros de mi congregación ya están cargando su nave con suministros. Además, tengo un regalo de agradecimiento para usted de parte de la iglesia de San Drusus. Con gente como usted, este rincón del universo dejado de la mano de Dios Emperador aún tiene una oportunidad de convertirse en un lugar mejor».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Auch, um etwas zu versprechen. Meine Mission wird sich um Eure Untertanen kümmern. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}Ihr habt uns viel Gutes getan{/d}, und es wäre unrechtschaffen, das nicht zu erwidern. Mitglieder meiner Gemeinde laden bereits Vorräte auf Euer Schiff. Und ich habe ein persönliches Geschenk des Dankes für Euch, vom Kult des Heiligen Drusus. Mit Leuten wie Euch hat diese vom Gottimperator verlassene Ecke des Universums noch die Chance, zu einem prächtigen Plätzchen zu werden."
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: "Auch, um etwas zu versprechen. Meine Kirche wird sich um Eure Untertanen kümmern. Ihr habt uns viel Gutes getan, und es wäre unrechtschaffen, das nicht zu erwidern. Mitglieder meiner Gemeinde laden bereits Vorräte auf Euer Schiff. Und ich habe ein persönliches Geschenk des Dankes für Euch, von der Kirche des Heiligen Drusus. Mit Leuten wie Euch hat diese vom Gottimperator verlassene Ecke des Universums noch die Chance, zu einem prächtigen Plätzchen zu werden."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Et pour vous promettre une chose : ma mission veillera sur vos sujets. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}Nous vous devons beaucoup{/d}, et il serait injuste de notre part de ne pas vous rendre la pareille. Des membres de ma congrégation sont en train de charger du matériel à bord de votre vaisseau, et j'ai moi-même un présent à vous offrir de la part du Culte de Saint Drusus. Avec des gens de votre trempe, même ce coin perdu de l'univers peut devenir un endroit où il fait bon vivre. »
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: « Et pour vous promettre une chose : mon église veillera sur vos sujets. Nous vous devons beaucoup, et il serait injuste de notre part de ne pas vous rendre la pareille. Des membres de ma congrégation sont en train de charger du matériel sur votre vaisseau, et j'ai moi-même un présent à vous offrir de la part de l'Église de Saint Drusus. Avec des gens de votre trempe, même ce coin perdu de l'univers peut devenir un endroit où il fait bon vivre. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Bir de söz vermeye. Misyonum, tebaanıza göz kulak olacak. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}Bize büyük iyiliğiniz dokundu{/d} ve bu iyiliğin karşılığını vermemek yanlış olurdu. Kurultayımdakiler, geminize erzak yüklemeye başladılar bile. Yanımda da Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın teşekkür maiyetinde size takdim etmek istediği kişisel bir armağan var. Evrenin Tanrı İmparator'un terk ettiği köşelerinin güzel bir yere dönüşme ihtimali, sizin gibi insanlar sayesinde hâlâ imkânsız değil."
languages.original_text: "To promise something, too. My mission will look after your subjects. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}You've done us a lot of good{/d}, and it would be unrighteous not to repay you in kind. Members of my congregation are already loading supplies to your ship. And I have a personal gift of appreciation for you from the Cult of Saint Drusus. With people like you, this God-Emperor-forsaken corner of the universe still has a chance to become a fine place."

traits.locale_text: "Bir de söz vermek için. Misyonum, tebaalarınıza göz kulak olacak. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}Bize büyük iyiliğiniz dokundu{/d} ve bu iyiliğin karşılığını vermemek yanlış olurdu. Kurultayımdaki üyeler geminize erzak yüklemeye başladılar bile. Yanımda da Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın teşekkür maiyetinde size takdim etmek istediği kişisel bir armağan var. Evrenin Tanrı İmparator'un terk ettiği köşelerinin güzel bir yere dönüşme olasılığı, sizin gibi insanlar sayesinde hâlâ sıfır değil."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
